insights.title: Strong Branded Keyword Dominance
insights.description: You rank #1 for 94% of branded keywords, maintaining strong brand protection.

insights.title: Growing Long-tail Coverage
insights.description: Non-branded long-tail keyword coverage increased 18% this quarter.

insights.title: Low Non-Branded Coverage
insights.description: Only 34% coverage for non-branded terms in your core category vs 52% industry average.

issues.impact: Missing discovery traffic from category-level searches
12 pages competing for same keywords, diluting ranking potential
Not ranking for common how/what/why queries that AI prioritizes

recommendations.title: Create AI-Optimized Content Clusters
recommendations.action: Build comprehensive content hubs around 10 priority non-branded topic clusters.

recommendations.title: Resolve Cannibalization
recommendations.action: Consolidate competing pages and implement proper internal linking hierarchy.

recommendations.title: Question-Based Content
recommendations.action: Create FAQ pages and Q&A content targeting conversational AI queries.
